author: Dave Saul
comment: The black faces only work in low power mode so you need to have "Always-on screen" to see them.
title: Nice app. Aussie-Aussie-Aussie   Oi-Oi-Oi!

author: Mike Smith
comment: Works well as a watch and has the Aussie flag on it, what more could you wish for with Australia Day coming up.
title: Great Aussie Day watch face.
